content: who doesn t love a velvet scrunchie they are super in right now i fell in love with the bernat velvet yarn and knew that one of things i would have to make is a scrunchie it crochets up super quick and makes a great accessory for yourself or great gifts for friends it is made with a mix of single half double double half treble and treble crochets it is the perfect pattern for beginners who are looking to expand their knowledge of stitches and gain some practice happy crocheting **note you will need a hair elastic to crochet around to make this pattern
